description.p1: First things first, you'll have to setup your OpenId Connect provider. Check out our
description.p2: for how {{application.name}} expects it to be set up.

errors.no-url: The {{open-id-connect.authority}} must be a valid url

errors.file-not-found: Unable to create theme, as the uploaded file was not found
errors.in-use: A theme by this name, is already in use. Update the existing one, or choose a different name

not-found.title: Theme not found
not-found.summary: Unselected theme {{ name }}, as it became unavailable

cant-set.title: Can't set {{ name }}
cant-set.summary: Error occurred while loading css content: {{ msg }}

description.p1: {{application.name}} can be set up with custom theme, to make the interface match your companies style better. Below you can see the themes you've already uploaded, and select the one to use globally.
description.p2: You can upload new ones, or delete existing ones here as well.

error.title: Error
error.summary: Failed to delete theme {{ name }}: {{ msg }}

no-file.title: Not uploading
no-file.summary: Can't upload empty of non existent file
